author: felicity
msg: bug 3883: using the full gecos field when doing spamcop reporting was sending out more than just the user name.  couldn't figure out why the full name would be necessary anyway, so just removed the full name from the From field of the report.

msg: bug 3734: uridnsbl rules work on body data, not header data, so change the rule type from header to body
